archimate:Principle.name: Culture Sensitive
archimate:Principle.documentation: The system should be designed, built, and operated with due care and attention to cultural issues relating to those who will experience the system in any way. These issues include such matters as religion, gender, race, nationality, language, dress code, (cont.) social customs, ethics, politics and the environment. The objective should be to avoid or minimize offence or distress caused to others.

properties.value: Independent audit and review of the inventory of requirements in this area to check for completeness & appropriateness & compliance of system functionality with this set of requirements.
